message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,000 is too low.  Could you do $13,500?
I'm getting close, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
